title: LYANER Women's Lantern Long Sleeve Wrap Tie Back Square Neck Double Layer Ruffle Hem A Line Short Mini Dress
description: Square neck, baggy long sleeves with elastic cuff, empire waist, wrap front, tie up bow knot back, sweet and lovely. Long sleeve ruffle mini dress with A-line silhouette, cover the tummy well and show your legs slimmer and longer, visually to have a charming shape.

Solid color, empire waist, zipper closure on back, double tiered ruffle curved design of the hem adds a sense of randomness. Lantern long sleeve a line dress enrich your dainty and feminine temperament just right.
Two-in-one style, you can pulled down the sleeve for a cute off-shoulder look. Double layer ruffle dress great for pair with heels, sneakers, sandals, necklace, clutch, boots for the stylish look.
Classy, chic and casual style, off shoulder long sleeve mini dress versatile for spring summer and falls, suitable for vacation, holiday, weekend, party, date, wedding guest, engagement, traveling.
Please refer to the LYANER Item Description below for Size Details.
